content: I ask my representative in Washington, to call for the resignation or firing of Janet Napolitano (Director of Homeland Security), for her release and support of the recent DHS report accusing patriotic Americans who are oppossed to such issues such as amnesty for illegal aliens, abortion, gun control, same sex marriage and out of control government spending, as being right wing extremists and potential domestic terrorists. Worst of all, the DHS report has even accused returning military veterans from the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan as potential domestic terrorists because of their military training. As a military veteran myself, I am appalled by this. The DHS under the Obama administration and Janet Napolitano is overstepping its original purpose of monitoring foreign terrorist threats from abroad, and is now attacking and monitoring loyal Americans thru intimidation and monitoring domestic emails. This violates the First and Fifth Amendments to the US Constitution. Congressional hearings should be conducted on the Department of Homeland Security for it's recent activities. Janet Napolitano must be forced to resign or bipartisan pressue put on President Obama to fire her. Thank you.
reply: I ask my representative in Washington, to call for the resignation or firing of Janet Napolitano (Director of Homeland Security), for her release and support of the recent DHS report accusing patriotic Americans who are oppossed to such issues such as amnesty for illegal aliens, abortion, gun control, same sex marriage and out of control government spending, as being right wing extremists and potential domestic terrorists. Worst of all, the DHS report has even accused returning military veterans from the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan as potential domestic terrorists because of their military training. As a military veteran myself, I am appalled by this. The DHS under the Obama administration and Janet Napolitano is overstepping its original purpose of monitoring foreign terrorist threats from abroad, and is now attacking and monitoring loyal Americans thru intimidation and monitoring domestic emails. This violates the First and Fifth Amendments to the US Constitution. Congressional hearings should be conducted on the Department of Homeland Security for it's recent activities. Janet Napolitano must be forced to resign or bipartisan pressue put on President Obama to fire her. Thank you.
title: An Insult from Janet Napolitano

content: quote: Worst of all, the DHS report has even accused returning military veterans from the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan as potential domestic terrorists because of their military training. As a military veteran myself, I am appalled by this. 1. They released the report. But the report was wrote well over a year ago. 2. The report says “Rightwing extremists will attempt to recruit and radicalize returning veterans in order to exploit their skills and knowledge derived from military training and combat.” So how is saying that an extremist will attempt to recruit someone make that person an extremist also? Did Obama's campaign to get you to vote for him make you a democrat?

content: This is an insult to vets and Janet Napolitano was correct to apologise. I see nothing about groups trying to influence returning veterans. According to the Washington Post... In the report, dated April 7 but begun last year, the Department of Homeland Security's intelligence section stated, "The return of military veterans facing significant challenges reintegrating into their communities could lead to the potential emergence of terrorist groups or lone wolf extremists capable of carrying out violent attacks." and... "It may include groups and individuals that are dedicated to a single issue, such as opposition to abortion or immigration." "http://voices.washingtonpost.com/44/2009/04/16/napolitano_apologizes_to_veter.html?wprss=44"
reply: This is an insult to vets and Janet Napolitano was correct to apologise. I see nothing about groups trying to influence returning veterans. According to the Washington Post... content: "http://www.foxnews.com/projects/pdf/041609_extremism.pdf" From the PDF File dated April 07,2009. "(U) Disgruntled Military Veterans (U//FOUO) DHS/I&A assesses that rightwing extremists will attempt to recruit and radicalize returning veterans in order to exploit their skills and knowledge derived from military training and combat. These skills and knowledge have the potential to boost the capabilities of extremists—including lone wolves or small terrorist cells—to carry out violence. The willingness of a small percentage of military personnel to join extremist groups during the 1990s because they were disgruntled, disillusioned, or suffering from the psychological effects of war is being replicated today." On Page 7 of 9.

content: I am appalled. She should be fired. To release such a report, implying that some of our brave Men and Women could come home and become terrorists, after they have sacrificed so much in the face of terrorism to me is disrespectful. If we are at the point where our Gorvernment has to worry about its own Military members turning on them, then what does this say to all of you. Its not like this report suggests just a few might turn. This report suggests that many may turn. So whats the next step after this. Do we now distrust our Military, then our FBI, our CIA our NSA, our Police and law enforcement. The people who defend our nation, our families and friends. Do we no longer hold them with the upmost respect and value their efforts. It is those who defend our nation on all fronts that will hold you accountable, you Socialists and Communists.

content: I ask my representative in Washington, to call for the resignation or firing of Janet Napolitano (Director of Homeland Security), for her release and support of the recent DHS report accusing patriotic Americans who are oppossed to such issues such as amnesty for illegal aliens, abortion, gun control, same sex marriage and out of control government spending, as being right wing extremists and potential domestic terrorists. Worst of all, the DHS report has even accused returning military veterans from the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan as potential domestic terrorists because of their military training. As a military veteran myself, I am appalled by this. The DHS under the Obama administration and Janet Napolitano is overstepping its original purpose of monitoring foreign terrorist threats from abroad, and is now attacking and monitoring loyal Americans thru intimidation and monitoring domestic emails. This violates the First and Fifth Amendments to the US Constitution. Congressional hearings should be conducted on the Department of Homeland Security for it's recent activities. Janet Napolitano must be forced to resign or bipartisan pressue put on President Obama to fire her. Thank you.
reply: I ask my representative in Washington, to call for the resignation or firing of Janet Napolitano (Director of Homeland Security), for her release and support of the recent DHS report accusing patriotic Americans who are oppossed to such issues such as amnesty for illegal aliens, abortion, gun control, same sex marriage and out of control government spending, as being right wing extremists and potential domestic terrorists. Worst of all, the DHS report has even accused returning military veterans from the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan as potential domestic terrorists because of their military training. As a military veteran myself, I am appalled by this. This violates the First and Fifth Amendments to the US Constitution. Congressional hearings should be conducted on the Department of Homeland Security for it's recent activities. Janet Napolitano must be forced to resign or bipartisan pressue put on President Obama to fire her. Thank you.
title: An Insult from Janet Napolitano

content: quote: Worst of all, the DHS report has even accused returning military veterans from the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan as potential domestic terrorists because of their military training. As a military veteran myself, I am appalled by this. 1. They released the report. But the report was wrote well over a year ago. 2. The report says “Rightwing extremists will attempt to recruit and radicalize returning veterans in order to exploit their skills and knowledge derived from military training and combat.” So how is saying that an extremist will attempt to recruit someone make that person an extremist also? Did Obama's campaign to get you to vote for him make you a democrat?

content: This is an insult to vets and Janet Napolitano was correct to apologise. I see nothing about groups trying to influence returning veterans. According to the Washington Post... In the report, dated April 7 but begun last year, the Department of Homeland Security's intelligence section stated, "The return of military veterans facing significant challenges reintegrating into their communities could lead to the potential emergence of terrorist groups or lone wolf extremists capable of carrying out violent attacks." and... "It may include groups and individuals that are dedicated to a single issue, such as opposition to abortion or immigration." "http://voices.washingtonpost.com/44/2009/04/16/napolitano_apologizes_to_veter.html?wprss=44"
reply: This is an insult to vets and Janet Napolitano was correct to apologise. I see nothing about groups trying to influence returning veterans. According to the Washington Post... content: "http://www.foxnews.com/projects/pdf/041609_extremism.pdf" From the PDF File dated April 07,2009. "(U) Disgruntled Military Veterans (U//FOUO) DHS/I&A assesses that rightwing extremists will attempt to recruit and radicalize returning veterans in order to exploit their skills and knowledge derived from military training and combat. These skills and knowledge have the potential to boost the capabilities of extremists—including lone wolves or small terrorist cells—to carry out violence. The willingness of a small percentage of military personnel to join extremist groups during the 1990s because they were disgruntled, disillusioned, or suffering from the psychological effects of war is being replicated today." On Page 7 of 9.
